    Studying for a PhD

    We are always looking for motivated and able students to join our group and study for a PhD. See

    • EPSRC Doctoral Training Centre in Statistical Applied Mathematics at Bath (SAMBa)
    • Doctoral College (for applications)
    • Taught Course Centre (TCC)
    • MSc Mathematics with Data Science for Industry
